name: Times 4 Table
description:
Made with GameMaker Studio.

Use your Mouse to complete the x4 table.

In the mixed number game...Don't click on Number Bubbles if they're on top of other numbers. 

If so, both numbers will be chosen and you'll get a wrong answer.

 

Note: More games in this series will be available soon. Some can already be played at:

k12gamer.weebly.com
